engChrName: Oh, I wasn't expecting to see you all again so soon.
engSearchText: Oh, I wasn't expecting to see you all again so soon.
jpnChrName: おや皆様、思っていたよりも 早い到着ですな。
jpnSearchText:
おや皆様、思っていたよりも
早い到着ですな。

engChrName: Have you learned anything about the young lady or her captors?
engSearchText:
Have you learned anything about the young lady or
her captors?
jpnChrName: お嬢様の件ですが…… 何か情報を掴めたでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様の件ですが……
何か情報を掴めたでしょうか。

engChrName: Sorry, we're still lookin' into it. We'll be sure to update you as soon as we know everything.
engSearchText:
Sorry, we're still lookin' into it. We'll be sure to
update you as soon as we know everything.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、まだ調査中なんだ。 改めてまとめて報告させてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いな、まだ調査中なんだ。
改めてまとめて報告させてもらうぜ。

engChrName: I understand. Please, do what you must to get to the bottom of this. Spare no effort for my lady.
engSearchText:
I understand. Please, do what you must to get to the
bottom of this. Spare no effort for my lady.
jpnChrName: かしこまりました…… どうかお嬢様の事をよろしくお願いしますぞ。
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました……
どうかお嬢様の事をよろしくお願いしますぞ。

engChrName: Happy Revolution Festival! As you'd probably expect, the park is absolutely brimming with people today.
engSearchText:
Happy Revolution Festival! As you'd probably expect,
the park is absolutely brimming with people today.
jpnChrName: やあ、革命記念祭おめでとう！ 今日は記念公園も賑わっているよ。
jpnSearchText:
やあ、革命記念祭おめでとう！
今日は記念公園も賑わっているよ。

engChrName: Big surprise when it's named after Sheena Dirke, I know. It's always crazy when this time of year rolls around.
engSearchText:
Big surprise when it's named after Sheena Dirke,
I know. It's always crazy when this time of year
rolls around.
jpnChrName: ここはシーナ・ディルク由来の場所でもあるし 例年記念祭には盛り上がるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここはシーナ・ディルク由来の場所でもあるし
例年記念祭には盛り上がるんだ。

engChrName: Feel free to enjoy yourselves as long as you like. The weather's just perfect today!
engSearchText:
Feel free to enjoy yourselves as long as you like.
The weather's just perfect today!
jpnChrName: よく晴れていい天気になったし、 是非ゆっくり楽しんでいってほしいね。
jpnSearchText:
よく晴れていい天気になったし、
是非ゆっくり楽しんでいってほしいね。

engChrName: You guys never seem to catch a break. I feel like you're always wrapped up in something when I see you.
engSearchText:
You guys never seem to catch a break. I feel like
you're always wrapped up in something when I
see you.
jpnChrName: 君たちも大変だなぁ。 相変わらず下請けの仕事三昧みたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
君たちも大変だなぁ。
相変わらず下請けの仕事三昧みたいだし。

engChrName: Anyway, the forest's been closed off this whole time. I have to imagine it's pretty thick with monsters.
engSearchText:
Anyway, the forest's been closed off this whole time.
I have to imagine it's pretty thick with monsters.
jpnChrName: 森林区画はずっと封鎖されていてね。 魔獣もそれなりにいると思う。
jpnSearchText:
森林区画はずっと封鎖されていてね。
魔獣もそれなりにいると思う。

engChrName: Be careful in there. If you need to step out, don't hesitate to do so.
engSearchText:
Be careful in there. If you need to step out, don't
hesitate to do so.
jpnChrName: どうかくれぐれも気を付けて。 何かあれば戻ってきてくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
どうかくれぐれも気を付けて。
何かあれば戻ってきてくれよ。

engChrName: Oh, I remember you guys. You helped us out with our monster problem earlier.
engSearchText:
Oh, I remember you guys. You helped us out with our
monster problem earlier.
jpnChrName: ああ、君達は以前に魔獣の駆除に 協力してくれた……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、君達は以前に魔獣の駆除に
協力してくれた……

engChrName: Thanks again for all that! As you can see, we're back in business thanks to you.
engSearchText:
Thanks again for all that! As you can see, we're back
in business thanks to you.
jpnChrName: その節は世話になったね、お陰で この通り開園する事ができたよ。
jpnSearchText:
その節は世話になったね、お陰で
この通り開園する事ができたよ。

engChrName: A few areas still need work, but they'll reopen when they're ready. Hopefully we'll see a good uptick in visitors when all's said and done.
engSearchText:
A few areas still need work, but they'll reopen when
they're ready. Hopefully we'll see a good uptick in
visitors when all's said and done.
jpnChrName: 整備中のエリアも順次開放していく予定でね。 これから来園者も増えていく見込みさ。
jpnSearchText:
整備中のエリアも順次開放していく予定でね。
これから来園者も増えていく見込みさ。

engChrName: Once you enter the park, take a right and head over to the waterfront. You'll find the monster there. Thanks so much for doing this.
engSearchText:
Once you enter the park, take a right and head over
to the waterfront. You'll find the monster there.
Thanks so much for doing this.
jpnChrName: 魔獣が現れたのは、入って右側の水辺エリアだ。 すまないがよろしく頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣が現れたのは、入って右側の水辺エリアだ。
すまないがよろしく頼んだよ。

engChrName: Oh, it's almost time for me to trade places. My shift's nearly up.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's almost time for me to trade places. My shift's
nearly up.
jpnChrName: そうそう、それともうじき交代の時間でね。
jpnSearchText: そうそう、それともうじき交代の時間でね。

engChrName: Someone else will probably be posted here when you get back. Make sure to return the key to them when you're ready to leave, all right?
engSearchText:
Someone else will probably be posted here when you
get back. Make sure to return the key to them when
you're ready to leave, all right?
jpnChrName: 帰りは別の者が立っていると思うから、 鍵はその彼に返してくれるかい？
jpnSearchText:
帰りは別の者が立っていると思うから、
鍵はその彼に返してくれるかい？

engChrName: Sure, no problem!
engSearchText: Sure, no problem!
jpnChrName: ええ、わかりましたっ！
jpnSearchText: ええ、わかりましたっ！

engChrName: Great. Now let's get out there and find us that monster.
engSearchText:
Great. Now let's get out there and find us
that monster.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、探索開始といくか。
jpnSearchText: そんじゃ、探索開始といくか。

engChrName: *sigh* Okay, on to the next task...
engSearchText: *sigh* Okay, on to the next task...
jpnChrName: ふう、次の作業はと……
jpnSearchText: ふう、次の作業はと……

engChrName: Oh, sorry, I'm really busy over here right now.
engSearchText: Oh, sorry, I'm really busy over here right now.
jpnChrName: すまない、こちらも立て込んでいてね。
jpnSearchText: すまない、こちらも立て込んでいてね。

engChrName: Someone else will probably be posted here when you get back. Make sure to return the key to them when you're ready to leave, all right?
engSearchText:
Someone else will probably be posted here when you
get back. Make sure to return the key to them when
you're ready to leave, all right?
jpnChrName: 帰りは別の者が立っていると思うから、 鍵はその彼に返してくれるかい？
jpnSearchText:
帰りは別の者が立っていると思うから、
鍵はその彼に返してくれるかい？

engChrName: Freakin'...! Of all the days to close the park, they had to do it today?!
engSearchText:
Freakin'...! Of all the days to close the park, they had
to do it today?!
jpnChrName: そうなんだよ～！ まさか臨時の休園日だったなんて！！
jpnSearchText:
そうなんだよ～！
まさか臨時の休園日だったなんて！！

engChrName: There's hardly any buses out here, too! We had no other way of getting back to town. *sigh* Our big date is ruined!
engSearchText:
There's hardly any buses out here, too! We had no
other way of getting back to town. *sigh* Our big date
is ruined!
jpnChrName: バスも少ないし帰れなくって…… あ～ん、折角のデートだったのに～！
jpnSearchText:
バスも少ないし帰れなくって……
あ～ん、折角のデートだったのに～！

engChrName: Now that's a shame, brother. Hate to see a lovely couple's parade get rained on so hard.
engSearchText:
Now that's a shame, brother. Hate to see a lovely
couple's parade get rained on so hard.
jpnChrName: ブラザー、そいつは災難だったな。
jpnSearchText: ブラザー、そいつは災難だったな。

engChrName: Tell you what: why don't I introduce you cool cats to a groovy restaurant on the way back to town? We can still save this date. You in?
engSearchText:
Tell you what: why don't I introduce you cool cats to
a groovy restaurant on the way back to town? We can
still save this date. You in?
jpnChrName: 良けりゃ首都まで送るついでに グレイトなレストランでも紹介してやろうか？
jpnSearchText:
良けりゃ首都まで送るついでに
グレイトなレストランでも紹介してやろうか？

engChrName: For real? Sure, we'd love to! By all means!
engSearchText: For real? Sure, we'd love to! By all means!
jpnChrName: ──マジで！？　よろしくお願いしますっ！！
jpnSearchText: ──マジで！？　よろしくお願いしますっ！！

engChrName: Mmm! The air is so fresh out here!
engSearchText: Mmm! The air is so fresh out here!
jpnChrName: う～ん…… 空気が美味しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
う～ん……
空気が美味しいですね。

engChrName: Huh. Never would've figured they'd have a green patch like this right next to the capital.
engSearchText:
Huh. Never would've figured they'd have a green
patch like this right next to the capital.
jpnChrName: ハン、首都のすぐ近くに こんな所があるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、首都のすぐ近くに
こんな所があるとはな。

engChrName: Looks empty, though. Where're all the people?
engSearchText: Looks empty, though. Where're all the people?
jpnChrName: しかし、人が殆どいねぇぞ？
jpnSearchText: しかし、人が殆どいねぇぞ？

engChrName: Seems like they've had the place closed off since yesterday due to the whole monster problem.
engSearchText:
Seems like they've had the place closed off since
yesterday due to the whole monster problem.
jpnChrName: ああ、普段はバスも通ってて それなりに人がいるんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、普段はバスも通ってて
それなりに人がいるんだが。

engChrName: Otherwise there'd be a pile of buses and people right in front of us.
engSearchText:
Otherwise there'd be a pile of buses and people right
in front of us.
jpnChrName: 例の依頼絡みで 昨日から休園してるらしい。
jpnSearchText:
例の依頼絡みで
昨日から休園してるらしい。

engChrName: Hey, you're right! It really is closed.
engSearchText: Hey, you're right! It really is closed.
jpnChrName: 本当だ、閉まっちゃってます。
jpnSearchText: 本当だ、閉まっちゃってます。

engChrName: They should know we're comin'. Let's have a chat with the ranger.
engSearchText:
They should know we're comin'. Let's have a chat
with the ranger.
jpnChrName: 話は通ってるはずだ。 管理人に聞いてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
話は通ってるはずだ。
管理人に聞いてみるぞ。

engChrName: Did you folks just drive up? I hate to break it to you, but we're closed for today.
engSearchText:
Did you folks just drive up? I hate to break it to you,
but we're closed for today.
jpnChrName: おっと、車で来たのかい？ すまないが今日は休園だよ。
jpnSearchText:
おっと、車で来たのかい？
すまないが今日は休園だよ。

engChrName: Actually, we're here on business.
engSearchText: Actually, we're here on business.
jpnChrName: いや、俺たちは──
jpnSearchText: いや、俺たちは──

engChrName: Van explained that they came in response to the park's request.
engSearchText:
Van explained that they came in response to the
park's request.
jpnChrName: “当局”の依頼で来たことを説明した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>“当局”の依頼で来たことを説明した。

engChrName: Oh, so you're the ones who are coming in to help, huh? Yeah, they told me to expect you.
engSearchText:
Oh, so you're the ones who are coming in to
help, huh? Yeah, they told me to expect you.
jpnChrName: 君たちが…… もちろん話は聞いているよ。
jpnSearchText:
君たちが……
もちろん話は聞いているよ。

engChrName: Sounds like you guys have a really nasty monster on your hands!
engSearchText:
Sounds like you guys have a really nasty monster on
your hands!
jpnChrName: 何でも危険な魔獣が現れたとか？
jpnSearchText: 何でも危険な魔獣が現れたとか？

engChrName: Yeah. It happens from time to time, unfortunately. The environment attracts them.
engSearchText:
Yeah. It happens from time to time, unfortunately.
The environment attracts them.
jpnChrName: 自然に囲まれた場所だからねぇ。 時々、こういう事もあるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
自然に囲まれた場所だからねぇ。
時々、こういう事もあるんだ。

engChrName: Usually, the bracers send out a big squad when this sort of thing happens. Are you three going to be okay going in alone?
engSearchText:
Usually, the bracers send out a big squad when this
sort of thing happens. Are you three going to be okay
going in alone?
jpnChrName: いつもは遊撃士が来てくれるんだが 君たちだけで大丈夫なのかい？
jpnSearchText:
いつもは遊撃士が来てくれるんだが
君たちだけで大丈夫なのかい？

engChrName: Yeah, we'll be fine. Nothin' we haven't seen before. Mind opening the gate for us so we can get to work?
engSearchText:
Yeah, we'll be fine. Nothin' we haven't seen before.
Mind opening the gate for us so we can get to work?
jpnChrName: ま、一応は慣れてるんでね。 入口を開けてもらえるか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、一応は慣れてるんでね。
入口を開けてもらえるか？

engChrName: Of course. Go right in. Thanks for taking care of this for us.
engSearchText:
Of course. Go right in. Thanks for taking care of this
for us.
jpnChrName: ああ、それじゃあ宜しく頼むよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、それじゃあ宜しく頼むよ。

engChrName: Going by our information, the monster should be somewhere along this path.
engSearchText:
Going by our information, the monster should be
somewhere along this path.
jpnChrName: 魔獣の情報があんのは この道のエリアだ。
jpnSearchText:
魔獣の情報があんのは
この道のエリアだ。

engChrName: Let's try and get this thing cleared out before sunset so we can head back while there's still light out.
engSearchText:
Let's try and get this thing cleared out before sunset
so we can head back while there's still light out.
jpnChrName: 夕方前に片付けて戻るぞ。
jpnSearchText: 夕方前に片付けて戻るぞ。

engChrName: Say, if we do a good job here, think you could treat us to someplace nice in the Entertainment District?
engSearchText:
Say, if we do a good job here, think you could treat us
to someplace nice in the Entertainment District?
jpnChrName: ハッ、それを済ませたら 歓楽街あたりでてめぇの奢りか？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、それを済ませたら
歓楽街あたりでてめぇの奢りか？

engChrName: Yeah, right. In your dreams, kid.
engSearchText: Yeah, right. In your dreams, kid.
jpnChrName: 誰が奢るかっつーの。
jpnSearchText: 誰が奢るかっつーの。

engChrName: Is that statue who I think it is?
engSearchText: Is that statue who I think it is?
jpnChrName: あの像は……
jpnSearchText: あの像は……

engChrName: Yep. Sheena Dirke, Calvard's most famous revolutionary.
engSearchText:
Yep. Sheena Dirke, Calvard's most
famous revolutionary.
jpnChrName: ああ……女革命家の像か。
jpnSearchText: ああ……女革命家の像か。

engChrName: The mother of Calvardian democracy, in the...stone.
engSearchText: The mother of Calvardian democracy, in the...stone.
jpnChrName: シーナ・ディルク── 民主化革命の母、だったか。
jpnSearchText:
シーナ・ディルク──
民主化革命の母、だったか。

engChrName: Yep. They opened this park and nature preserve in her memory after she died.
engSearchText:
Yep. They opened this park and nature preserve in
her memory after she died.
jpnChrName: ああ、彼女の没後に 自然保護を兼ねて開園したからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、彼女の没後に
自然保護を兼ねて開園したからな。

engChrName: When the revolution started, she was all of 20 years old, give or take. Still just a student.
engSearchText:
When the revolution started, she was all of 20 years
old, give or take. Still just a student.
jpnChrName: 確か革命を始めた頃は 二十歳かそこらの学生だった筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
確か革命を始めた頃は
二十歳かそこらの学生だった筈だ。

engChrName: She brought together a pretty colorful band of folks to make it all happen. Even had to take on the Erebonian army when it intervened.
engSearchText:
She brought together a pretty colorful band of folks to
make it all happen. Even had to take on the
Erebonian army when it intervened.
jpnChrName: クセの強い連中をまとめ上げての 大革命……帝国の侵攻もあったしな。
jpnSearchText:
クセの強い連中をまとめ上げての
大革命……帝国の侵攻もあったしな。

engChrName: Yeah, that's a hell of a lot to put on your plate. Girl must've had some real spunk to pull all that off.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's a hell of a lot to put on your plate.
Girl must've had some real spunk to pull all that off.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そう聞くと随分と 気合いが入った女みてぇだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そう聞くと随分と
気合いが入った女みてぇだが。

engChrName: Totally... Her statue is so beautiful. She looks so dignified.
engSearchText:
Totally... Her statue is so beautiful. She looks
so dignified.
jpnChrName: ……はい。 この像も凜々しくて素敵ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
……はい。
この像も凜々しくて素敵ですよね。

engChrName: I remember Abi mentioning how he saw a statue of the Lance Maiden when he went to the Empire a long time ago, and...
engSearchText:
I remember Abi mentioning how he saw a statue of
the Lance Maiden when he went to the Empire a
long time ago, and...
jpnChrName: 父（アブ）も昔、帝国に立ち寄った時に “槍の聖女”の像を見たそうで──
jpnSearchText:
父（アブ）も昔、帝国に立ち寄った時に
“槍の聖女”の像を見たそうで──

engChrName: What's the matter?
engSearchText: What's the matter?
jpnChrName: ん、どうかしたのか？
jpnSearchText: ん、どうかしたのか？

engChrName: Umm, nothing. It's just... There's something about her that looks familiar to me.
engSearchText:
Umm, nothing. It's just... There's something about
her that looks familiar to me.
jpnChrName: いえ、何かこう…… 何でしょう、見覚えがあるような。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、何かこう……
何でしょう、見覚えがあるような。

engChrName: Huh? What are you...? Actually, hang on. I get that same feeling, too, weirdly enough.
engSearchText:
Huh? What are you...? Actually, hang on. I get that
same feeling, too, weirdly enough.
jpnChrName: ハン？　……言われてみりゃ 俺も微妙に見覚えがあるな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン？　……言われてみりゃ
俺も微妙に見覚えがあるな。

engChrName: Not sure why. Doesn't really resemble any of the western chicks I picked up back in Langport.
engSearchText:
Not sure why. Doesn't really resemble any of the
western chicks I picked up back in Langport.
jpnChrName: 煌都で引っかけた 西方娘でもなさそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
煌都で引っかけた
西方娘でもなさそうだが。

engChrName: 'Picked up'? Like, off the ground?
engSearchText: 'Picked up'? Like, off the ground?
jpnChrName: 引っかけた？
jpnSearchText: 引っかけた？

engChrName: ...You don't even know what THAT means?
engSearchText: ...You don't even know what THAT means?
jpnChrName: ……そこからかよ。
jpnSearchText: ……そこからかよ。

engChrName: This is why little kids are always so hard to talk to. Gotta explain every tiny thing to them.
engSearchText:
This is why little kids are always so hard to talk to.
Gotta explain every tiny thing to them.
jpnChrName: チッ、ネンネのガキってのも 意外とやりにくいな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、ネンネのガキってのも
意外とやりにくいな。

engChrName: Mrr!
engSearchText: Mrr!
jpnChrName: むっ……
jpnSearchText: むっ……

engChrName: (Why do these two insist they recognize her? Sure, you're bound to run into her in textbooks, but other than that...)
engSearchText:
(Why do these two insist they recognize her?
Sure, you're bound to run into her in textbooks, but
other than that...)
jpnChrName: （教科書にも載ってるような偉人に   見覚えも何もねえ気がすんだが──）
jpnSearchText:
（教科書にも載ってるような偉人に
見覚えも何もねえ気がすんだが──）

engChrName: I don't get it. Why would you pick up women? Did they need to be carried for some reason?
engSearchText:
I don't get it. Why would you pick up women?
Did they need to be carried for some reason?
jpnChrName: だから何を引っかけたんですか？
jpnSearchText: だから何を引っかけたんですか？

engChrName: Nope! Forget I said anything!
engSearchText: Nope! Forget I said anything!
jpnChrName: いや、食い下がんなっつの！ 忘れろ！
jpnSearchText:
いや、食い下がんなっつの！
忘れろ！

engChrName: Enough, you two. We're here on business, so let's get down to it.
engSearchText:
Enough, you two. We're here on business, so let's get
down to it.
jpnChrName: おら、その辺にしとけ。 とっとと片付けに行くぞ！
jpnSearchText:
おら、その辺にしとけ。
とっとと片付けに行くぞ！

engChrName: Thank you all so much for saving us!

and take this.

jpnSearchText:
だが君たちなら大丈夫だろう。
これを持っていくといい。

engChrName: Obtained Memorial Park Forest Key.
engSearchText: Obtained Memorial Park Forest Key.
jpnChrName: 記念公園・森林区画の鍵を受け取った。
jpnSearchText: <C1>記念公園・森林区画の鍵を受け取った。

engChrName: Much obliged. We'll make sure to give it back on the way out.
engSearchText:
Much obliged. We'll make sure to give it back on the
way out.
jpnChrName: サンクス。 終わったらちゃんと返すぜ。
jpnSearchText:
サンクス。
終わったらちゃんと返すぜ。

engChrName: *sigh* I don't believe you, Van.
engSearchText: *sigh* I don't believe you, Van.
jpnChrName: ふう……もうヴァンさんは。
jpnSearchText: ふう……もうヴァンさんは。

engChrName: Very smooth, ignoring the 'official' part of that ranger's question.
engSearchText:
Very smooth, ignoring the 'official' part of that
ranger's question.
jpnChrName: クク、当局の依頼なんて 一言も言ってねぇのになァ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、当局の依頼なんて
一言も言ってねぇのになァ。

engChrName: Hmm... This doesn't feel entirely ethical to me.
engSearchText: Hmm... This doesn't feel entirely ethical to me.
jpnChrName: うーん。 やっぱり結構グレーだなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん。
やっぱり結構グレーだなぁ。

engChrName: Huh? I don't get it. What's the big deal?
engSearchText: Huh? I don't get it. What's the big deal?
jpnChrName: ？　そうですか？
jpnSearchText: ？　そうですか？

engChrName: You're as underhanded as ever. Oh, well. At least now we can get in and retrieve that photo!
engSearchText:
You're as underhanded as ever. Oh, well. At least now
we can get in and retrieve that photo!
jpnChrName: 相変わらず胡散臭いが…… これで何とか写真を取り戻せる！
jpnSearchText:
相変わらず胡散臭いが……
これで何とか写真を取り戻せる！

engChrName: Sure. If there's anything left of it to still be found, that is.
engSearchText:
Sure. If there's anything left of it to still be found,
that is.
jpnChrName: ま、無事ブツを 発見できたらの話だがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、無事ブツを
発見できたらの話だがな。

engChrName: The sealed-off forest in question appears to be to the left. We should make our way over.
engSearchText:
The sealed-off forest in question appears to be to
the left. We should make our way over.
jpnChrName: 閉鎖エリアは左手のようです。 それでは参りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
閉鎖エリアは左手のようです。
それでは参りましょう。

engChrName: Maxim is now accompanying the party.
engSearchText: Maxim is now accompanying the party.
jpnChrName: マクシムが同行状態となった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>マクシムが同行状態となった。

engChrName: Oh, it's so good to see you all!
engSearchText: Oh, it's so good to see you all!
jpnChrName: おお、裏解決屋の皆様……！
jpnSearchText: おお、裏解決屋の皆様……！

engChrName: I gather your investigation into the culprit has finished, yes? Would you please inform me of what you've found?
engSearchText:
I gather your investigation into the culprit has
finished, yes? Would you please inform me of what
you've found?
jpnChrName: 犯人の調査の方は捗ったでしょうか。 よろしければ報告を聞かせて頂いても……？
jpnSearchText:
犯人の調査の方は捗ったでしょうか。
よろしければ報告を聞かせて頂いても……？

engChrName: Sure. We've more or less figured out what led to all of this. It's gonna take some explainin', so we'll go one step at a time.
engSearchText:
Sure. We've more or less figured out what led to all
of this. It's gonna take some explainin', so we'll go
one step at a time.
jpnChrName: ああ、事件に繋がる背景はほぼ掴めた。 情報を順番に整理させてもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、事件に繋がる背景はほぼ掴めた。
情報を順番に整理させてもらうぞ。

engChrName: First thing you should know is, your girl's been hangin' out with a local punk named Eddy.
engSearchText:
First thing you should know is, your girl's been
hangin' out with a local punk named Eddy.
jpnChrName: まず第一に、嬢ちゃんと一緒に 遊んでたのはエディっつう不良かぶれだ。
jpnSearchText:
まず第一に、嬢ちゃんと一緒に
遊んでたのはエディっつう不良かぶれだ。

engChrName: He's part of a gang known as Desire, though he hasn't really fit in with them much until now.
engSearchText:
He's part of a gang known as Desire, though he
hasn't really fit in with them much until now.
jpnChrName: ヤツは《ディザイア》に所属しときながら いまいち馴染めてねえみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツは《ディザイア》に所属しときながら
いまいち馴染めてねえみたいだな。

engChrName: Desire? I've heard of that group.
engSearchText: Desire? I've heard of that group.
jpnChrName: 《ディザイア》ですか…… そのグループは私も存じています。
jpnSearchText:
《ディザイア》ですか……
そのグループは私も存じています。

engChrName: People say they're so ruthless and cunning, even the police closely monitor their movements.
engSearchText:
People say they're so ruthless and cunning, even the
police closely monitor their movements.
jpnChrName: 残忍かつ狡猾な不良グループで 警察も動向を注視しているとか。
jpnSearchText:
残忍かつ狡猾な不良グループで
警察も動向を注視しているとか。

engChrName: It's true. Yet despite all that, it seems that Eddy's been making a fair bit of money lately.
engSearchText:
It's true. Yet despite all that, it seems that Eddy's
been making a fair bit of money lately.
jpnChrName: はい……そして、エディさんは最近 急に羽振りが良くなったそうなんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい……そして、エディさんは最近
急に羽振りが良くなったそうなんです。

engChrName: In fact, it started happening right when he and Berzelia first met.
engSearchText:
In fact, it started happening right when he and
Berzelia first met.
jpnChrName: それはバーゼリアさんとエディさんが 知り合った時期と一致している……
jpnSearchText:
それはバーゼリアさんとエディさんが
知り合った時期と一致している……

engChrName: We have reason to believe these two facts are connected to each other.
engSearchText:
We have reason to believe these two facts are
connected to each other.
jpnChrName: 恐らくですが、この二つの情報は 結びついていると思います。
jpnSearchText:
恐らくですが、この二つの情報は
結びついていると思います。

engChrName: I think I understand what you're trying to say.
engSearchText: I think I understand what you're trying to say.
jpnChrName: それはつまり──
jpnSearchText: それはつまり──

engChrName: Essentially, you believe that this Eddy fellow is receiving payment in exchange for befriending my lady?
engSearchText:
Essentially, you believe that this Eddy fellow is
receiving payment in exchange for befriending
my lady?
jpnChrName: エディさんはお嬢様と仲良くなる事で 何者かからミラを貰っていたと──？
jpnSearchText:
エディさんはお嬢様と仲良くなる事で
何者かからミラを貰っていたと──？

engChrName: Yeah, something like that.
engSearchText: Yeah, something like that.
jpnChrName: ああ、恐らくな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、恐らくな。

engChrName: Considering who he hangs with, it makes sense that Desire would put him up to this.
engSearchText:
Considering who he hangs with, it makes sense that
Desire would put him up to this.
jpnChrName: ヤツの所属を考えれば、 そう命じたのは《ディザイア》に違いねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ヤツの所属を考えれば、
そう命じたのは《ディザイア》に違いねえ。

engChrName: Although it's possible that the money might actually come directly from Berzelia herself.
engSearchText:
Although it's possible that the money might actually
come directly from Berzelia herself.
jpnChrName: ま、そのミラの出所自体 そもそも嬢ちゃんからかもしれねえがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そのミラの出所自体
そもそも嬢ちゃんからかもしれねえがな。

engChrName: Hmm... I see.
engSearchText: Hmm... I see.

engChrName: To that end, we've uncovered evidence that appears to tie all of this together.
engSearchText:
To that end, we've uncovered evidence that appears
to tie all of this together.
jpnChrName: その点に関しては、確信を突くような 情報も得られました。
jpnSearchText:
その点に関しては、確信を突くような
情報も得られました。

engChrName: According to his mother, Eddy said something rather peculiar to her.
engSearchText:
According to his mother, Eddy said something rather
peculiar to her.
jpnChrName: “現在抱えている案件が上手くいけば 幹部へ昇進できる”──
jpnSearchText:
“現在抱えている案件が上手くいけば
幹部へ昇進できる”──

engChrName: Namely, that if his so-called 'current assignment' went well, he could be promoted to the gang's upper leadership.
engSearchText:
Namely, that if his so-called 'current assignment'
went well, he could be promoted to the gang's
upper leadership.
jpnChrName: エディさんがお母様へ そう仰っていたと聞きました。
jpnSearchText:
エディさんがお母様へ
そう仰っていたと聞きました。

engChrName: Considering the timing of this statement, it feels all but certain that this assignment in question must refer to the kidnapping and ransom.
engSearchText:
Considering the timing of this statement, it feels all
but certain that this assignment in question must refer
to the kidnapping and ransom.
jpnChrName: 時期的に考えて、その案件というのは まさにこの身代金の要求かと。
jpnSearchText:
時期的に考えて、その案件というのは
まさにこの身代金の要求かと。

engChrName: I see... I believe I understand the situation now.
engSearchText: I see... I believe I understand the situation now.
jpnChrName: ……だいぶ状況が見えて参りました。
jpnSearchText: ……だいぶ状況が見えて参りました。

engChrName: Basically, it was Eddy who committed the kidnapping, while Desire was the organization that masterminded it, correct?
engSearchText:
Basically, it was Eddy who committed the
kidnapping, while Desire was the organization that
masterminded it, correct?
jpnChrName: つまりお嬢様を誘拐したのはエディさん── 計画犯は《ディザイア》という事ですか。
jpnSearchText:
つまりお嬢様を誘拐したのはエディさん──
計画犯は《ディザイア》という事ですか。

engChrName: Yeah, but that's not all. This is where things get crazy.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but that's not all. This is where things
get crazy.
jpnChrName: でも、それで終わりじゃないんです。
jpnSearchText: でも、それで終わりじゃないんです。

engChrName: It looks like Berzelia herself was in on the plan, too!
engSearchText: It looks like Berzelia herself was in on the plan, too!
jpnChrName: どうやらバーゼリアさん自らも 誘拐に関わっていたみたいなんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
どうやらバーゼリアさん自らも
誘拐に関わっていたみたいなんですよね。

engChrName: Yeah, but it gets shittier than that.
engSearchText: Yeah, but it gets shittier than that.
jpnChrName: だが、それで済む単純な話じゃねえんだよな。
jpnSearchText: だが、それで済む単純な話じゃねえんだよな。

engChrName: From what we've heard, your little princess was all too happy to have those goons whisk her off and hold her for 'ransom.'
engSearchText:
From what we've heard, your little princess was all too
happy to have those goons whisk her off and hold her
for 'ransom.'
jpnChrName: そのバーゼリアお嬢様自身、 ノリノリで誘拐に関わってたみたいだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そのバーゼリアお嬢様自身、
ノリノリで誘拐に関わってたみたいだぜ？

engChrName: Sh-She was? I...
engSearchText: Sh-She was? I...
jpnChrName: そ、それは…………
jpnSearchText: そ、それは…………

engChrName: It checks out the more you think about it. Long story short, this whole thing is...
engSearchText:
It checks out the more you think about it. Long story
short, this whole thing is...
jpnChrName: ここまで言えば分かるよな。 つまり今回の事件の真相はこうだ──
jpnSearchText:
ここまで言えば分かるよな。
つまり今回の事件の真相はこうだ──

engChrName: (A legit kidnapping plot hatched by Desire...)
engSearchText: (A legit kidnapping plot hatched by Desire...)
jpnChrName: （事件の真相は《ディザイア》による   バーゼリアお嬢様の誘拐事件──）
jpnSearchText:
（事件の真相は《ディザイア》による
バーゼリアお嬢様の誘拐事件──）

engChrName: (It's not completely wrong, but there's more to this case than that alone.)
engSearchText:
(It's not completely wrong, but there's more to this
case than that alone.)
jpnChrName: （そいつは間違いねえんだが、 問題なのはそれだけじゃねえって所だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（そいつは間違いねえんだが、
問題なのはそれだけじゃねえって所だ。）

engChrName: (A fake kidnapping conceived by Berzelia with the help of Desire...)
engSearchText:
(A fake kidnapping conceived by Berzelia with the
help of Desire...)
jpnChrName: （事件の真相はバーゼリアお嬢様による、   《ディザイア》を利用した狂言誘拐──）
jpnSearchText:
（事件の真相はバーゼリアお嬢様による、
《ディザイア》を利用した狂言誘拐──）

engChrName: (It's not completely wrong, but there's more to this case than that alone.)
engSearchText:
(It's not completely wrong, but there's more to this
case than that alone.)
jpnChrName: （そいつは間違いねえんだが、 問題なのはそれだけじゃねえって所だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（そいつは間違いねえんだが、
問題なのはそれだけじゃねえって所だ。）

engChrName: The truth of the matter is, this kidnapping is both real and staged at the same time.
engSearchText:
The truth of the matter is, this kidnapping is both
real and staged at the same time.
jpnChrName: 事件の真相は── “誘拐”と“狂言誘拐”その両方だ。
jpnSearchText:
事件の真相は──
“誘拐”と“狂言誘拐”その両方だ。

engChrName: I will admit, I had the faintest suspicion deep down that may indeed be the case.
engSearchText:
I will admit, I had the faintest suspicion deep down
that may indeed be the case.
jpnChrName: なるほど…… 私も薄々そうとは思っておりましたが。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……
私も薄々そうとは思っておりましたが。

engChrName: Then let me rephrase my earlier assessment. In essence, my lady initially devised the kidnapping to be staged.
engSearchText:
Then let me rephrase my earlier assessment.
In essence, my lady initially devised the kidnapping to
be staged.
jpnChrName: そうなると発端は お嬢様が仕組んだ“狂言誘拐”で……
jpnSearchText:
そうなると発端は
お嬢様が仕組んだ“狂言誘拐”で……

engChrName: However, now that Desire is involved, they're now attempting to turn it into an actual one with genuine stakes, yes?
engSearchText:
However, now that Desire is involved, they're now
attempting to turn it into an actual one with genuine
stakes, yes?
jpnChrName: それに目を付けた《ディザイア》が “本物の誘拐”にしようとしているわけですな。
jpnSearchText:
それに目を付けた《ディザイア》が
“本物の誘拐”にしようとしているわけですな。

engChrName: Bingo. They're only pretending to help her with her plan.
engSearchText:
Bingo. They're only pretending to help her with
her plan.
jpnChrName: ああ、《ディザイア》の連中は 嬢ちゃんに協力するふりをしているが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、《ディザイア》の連中は
嬢ちゃんに協力するふりをしているが……

engChrName: But in reality, they're after a much bigger payday.
engSearchText: But in reality, they're after a much bigger payday.
jpnChrName: 真の狙いは巨額の身代金にあるってこった。
jpnSearchText: 真の狙いは巨額の身代金にあるってこった。

engChrName: Knowing how evil these guys are, I definitely wouldn't put it past them to try something like this.
engSearchText:
Knowing how evil these guys are, I definitely
wouldn't put it past them to try something like this.
jpnChrName: チームの悪名高さから考えても、 ほぼ間違いない気がします……
jpnSearchText:
チームの悪名高さから考えても、
ほぼ間違いない気がします……

engChrName: Yeah, that's the score. They've got a nasty reputation for a reason.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's the score. They've got a nasty reputation
for a reason.
jpnChrName: ああ、これだけ悪名高い連中なんだ。 ほぼ確定だろうな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、これだけ悪名高い連中なんだ。
ほぼ確定だろうな。

engChrName: *sigh* If only I had paid greater heed to my lady's loneliness...
engSearchText:
*sigh* If only I had paid greater heed to my
lady's loneliness...
jpnChrName: ……私がもっとお嬢様の孤独に 寄り添う事が出来ていれば……
jpnSearchText:
……私がもっとお嬢様の孤独に
寄り添う事が出来ていれば……

engChrName: Perhaps she wouldn't have felt the need to go to such extreme lengths.
engSearchText:
Perhaps she wouldn't have felt the need to go to such
extreme lengths.
jpnChrName: 少なくとも、お嬢様自らが誘拐を 選ぶことは無かったのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも、お嬢様自らが誘拐を
選ぶことは無かったのかもしれません。

engChrName: I'm so sorry. I can only imagine how you must feel right now...
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry. I can only imagine how you must feel
right now...
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルドさん……
jpnSearchText: ラムズフェルドさん……

engChrName: It is what it is. We can't take back what's already happened.
engSearchText:
It is what it is. We can't take back what's
already happened.
jpnChrName: まあな……嬢ちゃんは、父親が仕事よりも自分を 選んでくれるかどうか試したかったんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……嬢ちゃんは、父親が仕事よりも自分を
選んでくれるかどうか試したかったんだろう。

engChrName: I think more than anything, she's trying to test her old man to see if he'll choose her over his work.
engSearchText:
I think more than anything, she's trying to test her
old man to see if he'll choose her over his work.
jpnChrName: だがまあ、起きちまったことは 最早なかったことにはできねえ。
jpnSearchText:
だがまあ、起きちまったことは
最早なかったことにはできねえ。

engChrName: Moving along, I believe the main question now is how to go about addressing the ransom itself.
engSearchText:
Moving along, I believe the main question now is
how to go about addressing the ransom itself.
jpnChrName: 話を先に進めるとして── 身代金の取引はどのように致しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
話を先に進めるとして──
身代金の取引はどのように致しましょうか。

engChrName: You do not have to respond to their demands. We can attempt to ambush them instead, if you prefer.
engSearchText:
You do not have to respond to their demands.
We can attempt to ambush them instead, if
you prefer.
jpnChrName: 素直に応じるのではなく、奇襲をかける事も 選択肢の内かと思いますが。
jpnSearchText:
素直に応じるのではなく、奇襲をかける事も
選択肢の内かと思いますが。

engChrName: No, that's quite all right. My lady's safety is absolutely paramount.
engSearchText:
No, that's quite all right. My lady's safety is
absolutely paramount.
jpnChrName: いえ……お嬢様の安全確保が最優先です。
jpnSearchText: いえ……お嬢様の安全確保が最優先です。

engChrName: As much as I would prefer to avoid doing so, I'm fully willing to offer the money, if that's what it takes.
engSearchText:
As much as I would prefer to avoid doing so, I'm fully
willing to offer the money, if that's what it takes.
jpnChrName: 出来れば避けたい所ではありますが、 身代金が相手の手に渡ってしまっても構いません。
jpnSearchText:
出来れば避けたい所ではありますが、
身代金が相手の手に渡ってしまっても構いません。

engChrName: Are you sure? 10 million mira is a massive amount, even for the president of a bank.
engSearchText:
Are you sure? 10 million mira is a massive amount,
even for the president of a bank.
jpnChrName: でも、１０００万ミラとなると 銀行の頭取とはいえ安くは無いはずですよね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、１０００万ミラとなると
銀行の頭取とはいえ安くは無いはずですよね。

engChrName: Indeed it is. Nevertheless, I am prepared to take full responsibility for such a loss.
engSearchText:
Indeed it is. Nevertheless, I am prepared to take full
responsibility for such a loss.
jpnChrName: ええ……この損失に関しての責任は 私がとらせて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……この損失に関しての責任は
私がとらせて頂きましょう。

engChrName: I'm certain that if my master were here, he would come to the same decision, without a doubt.
engSearchText:
I'm certain that if my master were here, he would
come to the same decision, without a doubt.
jpnChrName: 旦那様がいらっしゃれば、 きっと同じような判断を下されたはずです。
jpnSearchText:
旦那様がいらっしゃれば、
きっと同じような判断を下されたはずです。

engChrName: As you wish.
engSearchText: As you wish.
jpnChrName: そうですか……
jpnSearchText: そうですか……

engChrName: All right, then we'll play things straight with them.
engSearchText: All right, then we'll play things straight with them.
jpnChrName: 分かった、それじゃ真っ当に 取引に応じる形で行くとするか。
jpnSearchText:
分かった、それじゃ真っ当に
取引に応じる形で行くとするか。

engChrName: But keep in mind, we're talkin' about a gang that had the guts to pull something like this in the first place.
engSearchText:
But keep in mind, we're talkin' about a gang that had
the guts to pull something like this in the first place.
jpnChrName: だがな──相手はこんな大それた計画を企てる 不良グループだ。
jpnSearchText:
だがな──相手はこんな大それた計画を企てる
不良グループだ。

engChrName: I don't think it's realistic to expect these goons to be on the up-and-up when it comes time to make the exchange.
engSearchText:
I don't think it's realistic to expect these goons to be
on the up-and-up when it comes time to make
the exchange.
jpnChrName: この身代金の取引が素直に行われるとは思えねえ。
jpnSearchText: この身代金の取引が素直に行われるとは思えねえ。

engChrName: Best we stay flexible and see how they act. Depending on how it all goes down, we may need to shift gears.
engSearchText:
Best we stay flexible and see how they act.
Depending on how it all goes down, we may need to
shift gears.
jpnChrName: 向こうの出方次第だが、こっちも臨機応変に 動けるようにしておくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
向こうの出方次第だが、こっちも臨機応変に
動けるようにしておくぞ。

engChrName: If we do, we still might be able to get the girl back without you having to fork over any mira. No promises, but we'll see.
engSearchText:
If we do, we still might be able to get the girl back
without you having to fork over any mira.
No promises, but we'll see.
jpnChrName: それこそ、俺達の方でうまくやれば 身代金を渡さずに済む可能性もある。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ、俺達の方でうまくやれば
身代金を渡さずに済む可能性もある。

engChrName: Haha... I appreciate the consideration. It's clear how professional and thorough you all are.
engSearchText:
Haha... I appreciate the consideration. It's clear how
professional and thorough you all are.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうございます…… 何から何まで頼もしい限りですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ありがとうございます……
何から何まで頼もしい限りですよ。

engChrName: Regardless, we still have some time remaining before our meeting with my lady's captors is set to commence.
engSearchText:
Regardless, we still have some time remaining before
our meeting with my lady's captors is set
to commence.
jpnChrName: それでは……指定された時間まで 多少の猶予がございます。
jpnSearchText:
それでは……指定された時間まで
多少の猶予がございます。

engChrName: Shall we wait here until it's time to depart for the rendezvous point?
engSearchText:
Shall we wait here until it's time to depart for the
rendezvous point?
jpnChrName: この場で少しばかり待ってから 指定地点に向けて出発致しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この場で少しばかり待ってから
指定地点に向けて出発致しましょうか。

engChrName: Hmm... Let me give it some thought.
engSearchText: Hmm... Let me give it some thought.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうだな……
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうだな……

engChrName: Regardless, we still have some time remaining before our meeting with my lady's captors is set to commence.
engSearchText:
Regardless, we still have some time remaining before
our meeting with my lady's captors is set
to commence.
jpnChrName: お嬢様の身代金の取引のために 指定された時間まで、多少猶予がございます。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様の身代金の取引のために
指定された時間まで、多少猶予がございます。

engChrName: Shall we wait here until it's time to depart for the rendezvous point?
engSearchText:
Shall we wait here until it's time to depart for the
rendezvous point?
jpnChrName: この場で少しばかり待ってから 指定地点に向けて出発致しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この場で少しばかり待ってから
指定地点に向けて出発致しましょうか。

engChrName: Hmm... Let me give it some thought.
engSearchText: Hmm... Let me give it some thought.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうだな……
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうだな……

engChrName: Hate to do this to you, but do you mind if we make some preparations first before headin' out?
engSearchText:
Hate to do this to you, but do you mind if we make
some preparations first before headin' out?
jpnChrName: ……っと、悪いがその前に 準備をして来てもいいか？
jpnSearchText:
……っと、悪いがその前に
準備をして来てもいいか？

engChrName: Not at all. Take all the time you need. I will be here awaiting your return.
engSearchText:
Not at all. Take all the time you need. I will be here
awaiting your return.
jpnChrName: ええ、勿論ですとも。 私はこちらでお待ちしておりますね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、勿論ですとも。
私はこちらでお待ちしておりますね。

engChrName: Might as well. We're all set on our end.
engSearchText: Might as well. We're all set on our end.
jpnChrName: 後は時間まで待つのみだな。
jpnSearchText: 後は時間まで待つのみだな。

engChrName: Actually, before we go...I doubt those goons would take too kindly to all of us rolling up at once.
engSearchText:
Actually, before we go...I doubt those goons would
take too kindly to all of us rolling up at once.
jpnChrName: おっとそうだ……この大人数で行けば 《ディザイア》を刺激しかねない。
jpnSearchText:
おっとそうだ……この大人数で行けば
《ディザイア》を刺激しかねない。

engChrName: We should keep the number of people who meet with 'em to a minimum. You okay if it's only me who tags along?
engSearchText:
We should keep the number of people who meet with
'em to a minimum. You okay if it's only me who
tags along?
jpnChrName: 現場に向かうのは最低人数── 俺とアンタの２人でどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
現場に向かうのは最低人数──
俺とアンタの２人でどうだ？

engChrName: Certainly. That sounds like a wise suggestion.
engSearchText: Certainly. That sounds like a wise suggestion.
jpnChrName: ええ、私もそれに賛成です。
jpnSearchText: ええ、私もそれに賛成です。

engChrName: If I may make a suggestion, Mr. Arkride, why don't you pretend to be my subordinate?
engSearchText:
If I may make a suggestion, Mr. Arkride, why don't
you pretend to be my subordinate?
jpnChrName: それではヴァン様は、 私の部下という設定で参りましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それではヴァン様は、
私の部下という設定で参りましょうか。

engChrName: Hah. Never thought I'd be an underbutler. Works for me.
engSearchText:
Hah. Never thought I'd be an underbutler. Works
for me.
jpnChrName: ハッ、了解だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、了解だ。

engChrName: In that case, the rest of us will remain close by so that we can quickly move in, should you require our assistance.
engSearchText:
In that case, the rest of us will remain close by so that
we can quickly move in, should you require
our assistance.
jpnChrName: では、我々は速やかに駆け付けられる 地点で待機させて頂きましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
では、我々は速やかに駆け付けられる
地点で待機させて頂きましょうか。

engChrName: That sounds like a plan. Be careful, you two!
engSearchText: That sounds like a plan. Be careful, you two!
jpnChrName: お二人とも、気を付けて下さいね……！
jpnSearchText: お二人とも、気を付けて下さいね……！

engChrName: Good luck, guys! You've got this!
engSearchText: Good luck, guys! You've got this!
jpnChrName: 健闘を祈ります！
jpnSearchText: 健闘を祈ります！

engChrName: Knock 'em dead, chief. Let's see those hostage negotiation skills of yours.
engSearchText:
Knock 'em dead, chief. Let's see those hostage
negotiation skills of yours.
jpnChrName: お手並み拝見といかせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText: お手並み拝見といかせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Thanks, guys. Stay sharp in case things go south.
engSearchText: Thanks, guys. Stay sharp in case things go south.
jpnChrName: おう、いざって時は頼んだからな。
jpnSearchText: おう、いざって時は頼んだからな。

engChrName: Several minutes later, Van and Rumsfeld arrived at the location designated for the ransom delivery.
engSearchText:
Several minutes later, Van and Rumsfeld arrived at
the location designated for the ransom delivery.
jpnChrName: そして数分後、身代金の受け渡しの 予定時刻を目前に控えたヴァン達は──
jpnSearchText:
そして数分後、身代金の受け渡しの
予定時刻を目前に控えたヴァン達は──

engChrName: With only moments to spare, the two came prepared, hauling an attaché case filled with mira.
engSearchText:
With only moments to spare, the two came prepared,
hauling an attaché case filled with mira.
jpnChrName: ミラの入ったアタッシュケースを持ち、 指定された地点へと移動したのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ミラの入ったアタッシュケースを持ち、
指定された地点へと移動したのだった。

engChrName: ...There you are.
engSearchText: ...There you are.
jpnChrName: ……来たか。
jpnSearchText: ……来たか。

engChrName: Rumsfeld! You came!
engSearchText: Rumsfeld! You came!
jpnChrName: ラムズフェルド！ 来てくれたのね……！
jpnSearchText:
ラムズフェルド！
来てくれたのね……！

engChrName: Oh, my lady! I'm so relieved you're all right!
engSearchText: Oh, my lady! I'm so relieved you're all right!
jpnChrName: お嬢様……！ ご無事で安心いたしましたぞ！
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様……！
ご無事で安心いたしましたぞ！

engChrName: Whoa, now. Let's not count our chickens before they've hatched.
engSearchText:
Whoa, now. Let's not count our chickens before
they've hatched.
jpnChrName: クク、安心すんのは早いんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: クク、安心すんのは早いんじゃねえか。

engChrName: We specifically asked for the girl's pops to come do the trade-off, but I sure don't see him anywhere. What's the deal?
engSearchText:
We specifically asked for the girl's pops to come do
the trade-off, but I sure don't see him anywhere.
What's the deal?
jpnChrName: 俺達はコイツの親父が取引に来るよう 指定してたはずだが見当たらねえなあ？
jpnSearchText:
俺達はコイツの親父が取引に来るよう
指定してたはずだが見当たらねえなあ？

engChrName: Don't tell me he's the guy next to you. I find that a little hard to swallow.
engSearchText:
Don't tell me he's the guy next to you. I find that a
little hard to swallow.
jpnChrName: まさか、隣の男が親父だとでもほざくつもりか？
jpnSearchText: まさか、隣の男が親父だとでもほざくつもりか？

engChrName: No. The master is currently away on business in a remote region. We, as her bodyguards, have been dispatched in his stead.
engSearchText:
No. The master is currently away on business in a
remote region. We, as her bodyguards, have been
dispatched in his stead.
jpnChrName: 旦那様は辺境へと出張中ですので、 代わりに警護を任された我々が参りました。
jpnSearchText:
旦那様は辺境へと出張中ですので、
代わりに警護を任された我々が参りました。

engChrName: Sorry I'm not the guy you're lookin' for.
engSearchText: Sorry I'm not the guy you're lookin' for.
jpnChrName: 期待に添えなくて悪いな。
jpnSearchText: 期待に添えなくて悪いな。

engChrName: But don't worry. We still made sure to bring what you're really after.
engSearchText:
But don't worry. We still made sure to bring what
you're really after.
jpnChrName: だが、肝心のブツはきちんと持って来てあるぜ。
jpnSearchText: だが、肝心のブツはきちんと持って来てあるぜ。

engChrName: We got ten million mira right here. Should be enough to satisfy, yeah?
engSearchText:
We got ten million mira right here. Should be
enough to satisfy, yeah?
jpnChrName: 占めて１０００万ミラ── これさえあれば問題ねえんじゃねえのか。
jpnSearchText:
占めて１０００万ミラ──
これさえあれば問題ねえんじゃねえのか。

engChrName: Eh, it's good enough. You held up the bare minimum of your end, at least.
engSearchText:
Eh, it's good enough. You held up the bare minimum
of your end, at least.
jpnChrName: ハッ──まあいいだろう。 最低限の約束は守ってもらえたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ──まあいいだろう。
最低限の約束は守ってもらえたみてえだな。

engChrName: Sucks to be you, though, eh, girlie?
engSearchText: Sucks to be you, though, eh, girlie?
jpnChrName: しかし、残念だったなバーゼリアお嬢ちゃん。
jpnSearchText: しかし、残念だったなバーゼリアお嬢ちゃん。

engChrName: His own daughter gets nabbed, and your old man just throws some cash at the problem. Can't even be bothered to show his face.
engSearchText:
His own daughter gets nabbed, and your old man just
throws some cash at the problem. Can't even be
bothered to show his face.
jpnChrName: 娘が誘拐されても、顔も見せずに 金（ミラ）で解決しちまうとは愛がねえよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
娘が誘拐されても、顔も見せずに
金（ミラ）で解決しちまうとは愛がねえよなぁ。

engChrName: Don't you think it's a little suspicious he's at work? Maybe he decided to ditch you and hang out with his girl-toy instead.
engSearchText:
Don't you think it's a little suspicious he's at work?
Maybe he decided to ditch you and hang out with his
girl-toy instead.
jpnChrName: コイツは本当に仕事に行ってるかどうかも怪しいぜ？ もしかしてアンタを捨てて愛人と遊んでるのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
コイツは本当に仕事に行ってるかどうかも怪しいぜ？
もしかしてアンタを捨てて愛人と遊んでるのかもな。

engChrName: My father would never do any such thing.
engSearchText: My father would never do any such thing.
jpnChrName: お父様は、そんな人じゃないわ……
jpnSearchText: お父様は、そんな人じゃないわ……

engChrName: But...I suppose, perhaps, that he...doesn't love me after all, if even this failed to sway him.
engSearchText:
But...I suppose, perhaps, that he...doesn't love me
after all, if even this failed to sway him.
jpnChrName: でも……こんな事になっても、 お父様に私の想いは届かないのね…………
jpnSearchText:
でも……こんな事になっても、
お父様に私の想いは届かないのね…………

engChrName: Poor girl...
engSearchText: Poor girl...
jpnChrName: お嬢ちゃん…………
jpnSearchText: お嬢ちゃん…………

engChrName: My lady, you have nothing to fear.
engSearchText: My lady, you have nothing to fear.
jpnChrName: お嬢様、それは違いますぞ。
jpnSearchText: お嬢様、それは違いますぞ。

engChrName: It's true the master is...ill-mannered at times. But there's nobody in all of Zemuria who loves you more than he.
engSearchText:
It's true the master is...ill-mannered at times.
But there's nobody in all of Zemuria who loves you
more than he.
jpnChrName: 旦那様は不器用な方ではありますが、 誰よりもお嬢様を愛しておられます。
jpnSearchText:
旦那様は不器用な方ではありますが、
誰よりもお嬢様を愛しておられます。

engChrName: If you don't mind, I have a message I'd like for you to hear. Perhaps it will demonstrate how he truly feels.
engSearchText:
If you don't mind, I have a message I'd like for you
to hear. Perhaps it will demonstrate how he
truly feels.
jpnChrName: お気づきになられていないようですので、 僭越ながら私が再生いたしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
お気づきになられていないようですので、
僭越ながら私が再生いたしましょう。

engChrName: Is that...my Xipha? What's that doing here?
engSearchText: Is that...my Xipha? What's that doing here?
jpnChrName: ……？　それは私のザイファよね？
jpnSearchText: ……？　それは私のザイファよね？

engChrName: The master sent a recording to this device yesterday.
engSearchText: The master sent a recording to this device yesterday.
jpnChrName: ええ……これは昨日 旦那様から送信された物のようですな。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……これは昨日
旦那様から送信された物のようですな。

engChrName: Please, have a listen.
engSearchText: Please, have a listen.
jpnChrName: それでは再生いたしますぞ。
jpnSearchText: それでは再生いたしますぞ。

engChrName: *bzzt* Is this thing on? Am I being recorded?
engSearchText: *bzzt* Is this thing on? Am I being recorded?
jpnChrName: ザザッ……これで本当に音声が撮れているのか？
jpnSearchText: <C1>ザザッ……これで本当に音声が撮れているのか？

engChrName: Ahem. First, I should explain that I have to take off this morning on the first train out.
engSearchText:
Ahem. First, I should explain that I have to take off
this morning on the first train out.
jpnChrName: こほん……さて、今朝も列車の始発で 発たなければならないのでな。
jpnSearchText:
こほん……さて、今朝も列車の始発で
発たなければならないのでな。

engChrName: Since we cannot speak in person, I wanted to leave...a message for you, at the very least.
engSearchText:
Since we cannot speak in person, I wanted to leave...a
message for you, at the very least.
jpnChrName: 直接お前に伝えられない代わりに このメッセージを送りたいと思う。
jpnSearchText:
直接お前に伝えられない代わりに
このメッセージを送りたいと思う。

engChrName: That's...my father's voice! It's really him!
engSearchText: That's...my father's voice! It's really him!
jpnChrName: お、お父様──！？ この声はお父様だわ！
jpnSearchText:
お、お父様──！？
この声はお父様だわ！

engChrName: I... I am so sorry, Berzelia.
engSearchText: I... I am so sorry, Berzelia.
jpnChrName: ……済まないな、バーゼリア。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……済まないな、バーゼリア。

engChrName: I'm always so distracted with my work. I can only imagine how lonely you must feel.
engSearchText:
I'm always so distracted with my work. I can only
imagine how lonely you must feel.
jpnChrName: 仕事にかまけてばかりで、 お前に寂しい思いをさせてしまっている。
jpnSearchText:
仕事にかまけてばかりで、
お前に寂しい思いをさせてしまっている。

engChrName: Your birthday is coming up soon, isn't it.
engSearchText: Your birthday is coming up soon, isn't it.
jpnChrName: そこでなのだが……今年も お前の誕生日が近づいて来ているな。
jpnSearchText:
そこでなのだが……今年も
お前の誕生日が近づいて来ているな。

engChrName: I know I was away on other business trips for the past two birthdays, and wasn't able to celebrate as I should have.
engSearchText:
I know I was away on other business trips for the past
two birthdays, and wasn't able to celebrate as I
should have.
jpnChrName: 去年も一昨年も、出張のため留守にしていて 直接祝う事が出来なかったが……
jpnSearchText:
去年も一昨年も、出張のため留守にしていて
直接祝う事が出来なかったが……

engChrName: But I promise you, I'll do whatever it takes to make sure I'm home in time for your birthday this year.
engSearchText:
But I promise you, I'll do whatever it takes to make
sure I'm home in time for your birthday this year.
jpnChrName: 今年のお前の誕生日までには 必ず帰ってくると約束しよう。
jpnSearchText:
今年のお前の誕生日までには
必ず帰ってくると約束しよう。

engChrName: And when I do return, I'm going to give you your present myself.
engSearchText:
And when I do return, I'm going to give you your
present myself.
jpnChrName: そして直接私の手でお前にプレゼントを渡したい。
jpnSearchText: <C1>そして直接私の手でお前にプレゼントを渡したい。

engChrName: Until then, it pains me that I have to leave you alone yet again.
engSearchText:
Until then, it pains me that I have to leave you alone
yet again.
jpnChrName: それまでの間、またお前を一人に してしまう事を申し訳なく思うが……
jpnSearchText:
それまでの間、またお前を一人に
してしまう事を申し訳なく思うが……

engChrName: Please, try to keep your spirits up. Know that I really, truly do love you, Berzelia...my darling daughter.
engSearchText:
Please, try to keep your spirits up. Know that I really,
truly do love you, Berzelia...my darling daughter.
jpnChrName: お前を愛しているぞ、バーゼリア。 どうか元気で待っていてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
お前を愛しているぞ、バーゼリア。
どうか元気で待っていてくれ。

engChrName: *sniffle* Father! I didn't realize you cared so much...!
engSearchText: *sniffle* Father! I didn't realize you cared so much...!
jpnChrName: ううっ……お父様……っ！ そんな風に思っていてくれただなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……お父様……っ！
そんな風に思っていてくれただなんて……！

engChrName: Heh, glad he decided to step up and show he knows how to be a dad for once.
engSearchText:
Heh, glad he decided to step up and show he knows
how to be a dad for once.
jpnChrName: ヘッ…… 一応父親らしい所もあったんじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ……
一応父親らしい所もあったんじゃねえか。

engChrName: How'd you manage to come across that voicemail? I'm genuinely impressed.
engSearchText:
How'd you manage to come across that voicemail?
I'm genuinely impressed.
jpnChrName: 音声メールなんて よく見つけやがったな？
jpnSearchText:
音声メールなんて
よく見つけやがったな？

engChrName: Well, I remembered that the master asked me several days ago how to send such a message to someone.
engSearchText:
Well, I remembered that the master asked me several
days ago how to send such a message to someone.
jpnChrName: ふふ、数日前に旦那様から音声メールの 方法を尋ねられたことを思い出しましてな。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、数日前に旦那様から音声メールの
方法を尋ねられたことを思い出しましてな。

engChrName: It made me wonder if, perhaps, it was the young lady to whom he sent it. Then, when I went searching, sure enough, there it was.
engSearchText:
It made me wonder if, perhaps, it was the young lady
to whom he sent it. Then, when I went searching, sure
enough, there it was.
jpnChrName: もしやと思い調べてみたのですが、 どうやら“当たり”だったようです。
jpnSearchText:
もしやと思い調べてみたのですが、
どうやら“当たり”だったようです。

engChrName: *sniffle* How could I have been such a fool? I shouldn't have doubted Father and tested him like this.
engSearchText:
*sniffle* How could I have been such a fool?
I shouldn't have doubted Father and tested him
like this.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……私ったらお父様を試すような真似をして、 本当に馬鹿だったわ…………
jpnSearchText:
ぐすっ……私ったらお父様を試すような真似をして、
本当に馬鹿だったわ…………

engChrName: I'm sorry, Rumsfeld. I must confess. This whole kidnapping...was my own plan.
engSearchText:
I'm sorry, Rumsfeld. I must confess. This whole
kidnapping...was my own plan.
jpnChrName: ごめんなさい、ラムズフェルド。 この誘拐は……実は私がお願いした事だったの。
jpnSearchText:
ごめんなさい、ラムズフェルド。
この誘拐は……実は私がお願いした事だったの。

engChrName: I...was scared Father didn't truly love me, so I...
engSearchText: I...was scared Father didn't truly love me, so I...
jpnChrName: 私……お父様に愛されているのか心配で、それで……
jpnSearchText: 私……お父様に愛されているのか心配で、それで……

engChrName: Think nothing of it, my lady. You felt the need to act. I completely understand how you must feel.
engSearchText:
Think nothing of it, my lady. You felt the need to act.
I completely understand how you must feel.
jpnChrName: ええ、ご心配なさらないで下さい。 お嬢様の気持ちは私も理解しておりますから。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、ご心配なさらないで下さい。
お嬢様の気持ちは私も理解しておりますから。

engChrName: *sniffle* Heehee... Thanks, Rumsfeld.
engSearchText: *sniffle* Heehee... Thanks, Rumsfeld.
jpnChrName: ぐすっ……ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: ぐすっ……ありがとう。

engChrName: I'm okay, Eddy. You can let go of my hand now.
engSearchText: I'm okay, Eddy. You can let go of my hand now.
jpnChrName: エディ、もう大丈夫だから手を放して。
jpnSearchText: エディ、もう大丈夫だから手を放して。

engChrName: I might not have achieved what I set out to do, but I still want to pay everyone what I can in exchange for their time.
engSearchText:
I might not have achieved what I set out to do, but I
still want to pay everyone what I can in exchange for
their time.
jpnChrName: 一番の目的は果たせなかったけど…… 皆には私が融通できる範囲でちゃんとお礼をするわ。
jpnSearchText:
一番の目的は果たせなかったけど……
皆には私が融通できる範囲でちゃんとお礼をするわ。

engChrName: Berzelia, you don't have to do that. But if you're comfortable with it, I won't stop you.
engSearchText:
Berzelia, you don't have to do that. But if you're
comfortable with it, I won't stop you.
jpnChrName: 礼なんて……だがまあ、 お嬢ちゃんがそれでいいなら文句はないさ。
jpnSearchText:
礼なんて……だがまあ、
お嬢ちゃんがそれでいいなら文句はないさ。

engChrName: Nnnot. So. Quick, Eddy.
engSearchText: Nnnot. So. Quick, Eddy.
jpnChrName: 待てよ、エディ。
jpnSearchText: 待てよ、エディ。

engChrName: This dumbass sob story's over! Now the fun begins!
engSearchText:
This dumbass sob story's over! Now the
fun begins!
jpnChrName: ぬるい茶番劇はここで終いだ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ぬるい茶番劇はここで終いだ！

engChrName: Wh-What is the meaning of this?! We had a deal! Are you breaking it?!
engSearchText:
Wh-What is the meaning of this?! We had a deal!
Are you breaking it?!
jpnChrName: なっ──どういう事！？ 私との契約を破るつもりなの！？
jpnSearchText:
なっ──どういう事！？
私との契約を破るつもりなの！？

engChrName: You bet your fine, rich ass we are! Why take your pitiful paycheck when we could make off with that hefty ransom?!
engSearchText:
You bet your fine, rich ass we are! Why take your
pitiful paycheck when we could make off with that
hefty ransom?!
jpnChrName: 決まってんだろ、お嬢ちゃんから貰う報酬よりも 身代金の方がよっぽど儲かるんだからな！
jpnSearchText:
決まってんだろ、お嬢ちゃんから貰う報酬よりも
身代金の方がよっぽど儲かるんだからな！

engChrName: And it's all thanks to our wonderful pal, Eddy. We couldn't have done it without him.
engSearchText:
And it's all thanks to our wonderful pal, Eddy.
We couldn't have done it without him.
jpnChrName: いやぁしかし、いいお友達を作ってくれた エディには感謝しねえとな？
jpnSearchText:
いやぁしかし、いいお友達を作ってくれた
エディには感謝しねえとな？

engChrName: It's not every day you meet a gullible mark who's just begging to be held hostage and robbed of her own money!
engSearchText:
It's not every day you meet a gullible mark who's just
begging to be held hostage and robbed of her
own money!
jpnChrName: おかげで金（ミラ）になるカモが自分からノコノコと 人質になりに来てくれたんだからな！
jpnSearchText:
おかげで金（ミラ）になるカモが自分からノコノコと
人質になりに来てくれたんだからな！

engChrName: You can't be serious. You tricked me, Eddy? I trusted you!
engSearchText:
You can't be serious. You tricked me, Eddy? I
trusted you!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな……ずっと私を騙していたの？ エディの事、信じてたのに……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな……ずっと私を騙していたの？
エディの事、信じてたのに……！

engChrName: No, that's not true! I only agreed to help out with your fake kidnapping, I swear! This is news to me, too!
engSearchText:
No, that's not true! I only agreed to help out with
your fake kidnapping, I swear! This is news to
me, too!
jpnChrName: 違うんだ、俺はただ 狂言誘拐を手伝うつもりで……！
jpnSearchText:
違うんだ、俺はただ
狂言誘拐を手伝うつもりで……！

engChrName: And as for you two gents...don't even think about trying anything funny.
engSearchText:
And as for you two gents...don't even think about
trying anything funny.
jpnChrName: おっと、そっちの二人も 下手に動くんじゃねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
おっと、そっちの二人も
下手に動くんじゃねえぞ？

engChrName: Hand over the case, nice and quiet-like.
engSearchText: Hand over the case, nice and quiet-like.
jpnChrName: ミラの入ったアタッシュケースをこっちに引き渡せ。
jpnSearchText: ミラの入ったアタッシュケースをこっちに引き渡せ。

engChrName: And make it quick, or else I can't guarantee daddy's little girl will celebrate her birthday in one piece.
engSearchText:
And make it quick, or else I can't guarantee daddy's
little girl will celebrate her birthday in one piece.
jpnChrName: さっさとしねえと、このカワイイお嬢ちゃんに 怪我をさせちまうかもな？
jpnSearchText:
さっさとしねえと、このカワイイお嬢ちゃんに
怪我をさせちまうかもな？

engChrName: You...! If you put even a single scratch on Ms. Berzelia, you will pay for it!
engSearchText:
You...! If you put even a single scratch on Ms.
Berzelia, you will pay for it!
jpnChrName: おのれ……！　少しでもお嬢様に 怪我をさせたらただでは済まさんぞ！
jpnSearchText:
おのれ……！　少しでもお嬢様に
怪我をさせたらただでは済まさんぞ！

engChrName: Man, I hate bein' right. I had a feeling it'd go down like this.
engSearchText:
Man, I hate bein' right. I had a feeling it'd go down
like this.
jpnChrName: 予想通りとはいえ、 気分がいい展開じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
予想通りとはいえ、
気分がいい展開じゃねえな。

engChrName: I didn't ask you to introduce yourself, but I know you're that famous spriggan everyone always talks about.
engSearchText:
I didn't ask you to introduce yourself, but I know
you're that famous spriggan everyone always
talks about.
jpnChrName: さっきは自己紹介してもらえなかったが、 お前が噂の裏解決屋だっつう事は知ってるぜ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきは自己紹介してもらえなかったが、
お前が噂の裏解決屋だっつう事は知ってるぜ。

engChrName: I was on the lookout for cops or bracers, but I sure didn't count on meeting someone like you. That geezer there's one conniving old fart.
engSearchText:
I was on the lookout for cops or bracers, but I sure
didn't count on meeting someone like you.
That geezer there's one conniving old fart.
jpnChrName: 一応、警察や遊撃士方面を警戒してたんだが…… そっちを当たるとは、とんだ策士だなジジイ。
jpnSearchText:
一応、警察や遊撃士方面を警戒してたんだが……
そっちを当たるとは、とんだ策士だなジジイ。

engChrName: So you know about Mr. Arkride as well, do you?
engSearchText: So you know about Mr. Arkride as well, do you?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋の方も知っているとは……
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋の方も知っているとは……

engChrName: I figured you to be some mere hoodlum, but it appears you're smarter than you look. A shame you waste it on such nonsense.
engSearchText:
I figured you to be some mere hoodlum, but it
appears you're smarter than you look. A shame you
waste it on such nonsense.
jpnChrName: ただの不良と思っていましたが、 無駄に頭は切れるようですな。
jpnSearchText:
ただの不良と思っていましたが、
無駄に頭は切れるようですな。

engChrName: Well, if you know who I am, then we can cut right to the chase.
engSearchText:
Well, if you know who I am, then we can cut right to
the chase.
jpnChrName: 俺を知ってるなら話は早えな。
jpnSearchText: 俺を知ってるなら話は早えな。

engChrName: I took on a job, and I fully intend to complete it. You're givin' that girl back, one way or another.
engSearchText:
I took on a job, and I fully intend to complete it.
You're givin' that girl back, one way or another.
jpnChrName: ウチで依頼を請け負ってる以上、 その嬢ちゃんは必ず解放してもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチで依頼を請け負ってる以上、
その嬢ちゃんは必ず解放してもらうぜ。

engChrName: If you wanna make a deal, we can talk, but not until you hand her over first.
engSearchText:
If you wanna make a deal, we can talk, but not until
you hand her over first.
jpnChrName: 取引すんのは構わねえが、 あくまで嬢ちゃんの引き渡しが先だ。
jpnSearchText:
取引すんのは構わねえが、
あくまで嬢ちゃんの引き渡しが先だ。

engChrName: Otherwise I've got permission from my butler friend to send you all straight to Aidios. Don't think I won't do it.
engSearchText:
Otherwise I've got permission from my butler friend
to send you all straight to Aidios. Don't think I won't
do it.
jpnChrName: 執事も言ってたが、万が一の事があれば お前らまとめて即女神逝きだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
執事も言ってたが、万が一の事があれば
お前らまとめて即女神逝きだぜ。

engChrName: Hey, hold on a minute, Jeffrey!
engSearchText: Hey, hold on a minute, Jeffrey!
jpnChrName: ま、待ってくれジェフリーさん！
jpnSearchText: ま、待ってくれジェフリーさん！

engChrName: The Desire I know would never stoop to something this low!
engSearchText:
The Desire I know would never stoop to something
this low!
jpnChrName: こんなの、オレの知ってるイカした 《ディザイア》のする事じゃねえよ──！
jpnSearchText:
こんなの、オレの知ってるイカした
《ディザイア》のする事じゃねえよ──！

engChrName: Put the gun down before you do anything we'll all regret! Please!
engSearchText:
Put the gun down before you do anything we'll
all regret! Please!
jpnChrName: らしくない事してないで、 銃を降ろして下さいジェフリーさん！
jpnSearchText:
らしくない事してないで、
銃を降ろして下さいジェフリーさん！

engChrName: We'd 'never' do something like this? Pff-ha! Don't make me laugh. You don't know the first thing about us.
engSearchText:
We'd 'never' do something like this? Pff-ha!
Don't make me laugh. You don't know the first thing
about us.
jpnChrName: ハッ……笑わせんな。 お前が《ディザイア》の何を知ってるって？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……笑わせんな。
お前が《ディザイア》の何を知ってるって？

engChrName: Listen, I got you in the gang for one reason and one reason only: because you made for a handy, expendable pawn.
engSearchText:
Listen, I got you in the gang for one reason and one
reason only: because you made for a handy,
expendable pawn.
jpnChrName: エディ、お前を飼ってやった理由はただ一つ── 捨て駒として使えそうだったからだ。
jpnSearchText:
エディ、お前を飼ってやった理由はただ一つ──
捨て駒として使えそうだったからだ。

engChrName: But you know what? You did good, putting this rich brat up to all this. Better than I ever expected, really.
engSearchText:
But you know what? You did good, putting this rich
brat up to all this. Better than I ever expected, really.
jpnChrName: だが今回、このお嬢ちゃんを そそのかしてくれたのは大手柄だったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だが今回、このお嬢ちゃんを
そそのかしてくれたのは大手柄だったぜ。

engChrName: I owe you one, so I'll tell you what: you can leave our gang right now, if you're so queasy about getting your hands dirty. How 'bout it?
engSearchText:
I owe you one, so I'll tell you what: you can leave our
gang right now, if you're so queasy about getting your
hands dirty. How 'bout it?
jpnChrName: ご褒美と言っちゃなんだが、礼に 今この場をもってチームを抜けさせてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ご褒美と言っちゃなんだが、礼に
今この場をもってチームを抜けさせてやるよ。

engChrName: You can't... You can't be serious. Jeffrey, tell me you're lying!
engSearchText:
You can't... You can't be serious. Jeffrey, tell me
you're lying!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな………… 嘘だよなジェフリーさん……！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな…………
嘘だよなジェフリーさん……！？

engChrName: I looked up to you! I thought you were badass!
engSearchText: I looked up to you! I thought you were badass!
jpnChrName: 俺は強くてかっこいいアンタに 憧れてたのに……！
jpnSearchText:
俺は強くてかっこいいアンタに
憧れてたのに……！

engChrName: Quit yer snivellin', already!
engSearchText: Quit yer snivellin', already!
jpnChrName: うぜえからお前は引っ込んでろや！
jpnSearchText: うぜえからお前は引っ込んでろや！

engChrName: Augh!
engSearchText: Augh!

engChrName: EDDY!
engSearchText: EDDY!
jpnChrName: エディ──！
jpnSearchText: エディ──！

engChrName: Anyway, getting back to business.
engSearchText: Anyway, getting back to business.
jpnChrName: さてと、待たせて悪かったな。
jpnSearchText: さてと、待たせて悪かったな。

engChrName: Where were we? Oh, right, letting the girl go free.
engSearchText: Where were we? Oh, right, letting the girl go free.
jpnChrName: 確か、先にお嬢ちゃんを 開放しろっつう話だったか？
jpnSearchText:
確か、先にお嬢ちゃんを
開放しろっつう話だったか？

engChrName: I wouldn't push my luck if I were you. Last time I checked, you weren't in a position to be making demands of us.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't push my luck if I were you. Last time I
checked, you weren't in a position to be making
demands of us.
jpnChrName: 交渉の主導権はこっちにある事を 忘れてるみてえだな……
jpnSearchText:
交渉の主導権はこっちにある事を
忘れてるみてえだな……

engChrName: Far as we're concerned, this chick's just a pile of used bait, now. You sure you want to push your luck?
engSearchText:
Far as we're concerned, this chick's just a pile of used
bait, now. You sure you want to push your luck?
jpnChrName: 言っとくが俺達はこのお嬢ちゃんが どうなっても構わないんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが俺達はこのお嬢ちゃんが
どうなっても構わないんだぜ？

engChrName: Eep!
engSearchText: Eep!
jpnChrName: ひぃっ…………
jpnSearchText: ひぃっ…………

engChrName: ...Very well. We shall hand over the case.
engSearchText: ...Very well. We shall hand over the case.
jpnChrName: ……分かりました。 先にこちらが荷物を引き渡しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
……分かりました。
先にこちらが荷物を引き渡しましょう。

engChrName: All we ask is that you return the young lady to us unharmed.
engSearchText:
All we ask is that you return the young lady to
us unharmed.
jpnChrName: これでお嬢様を無事に引き渡してもらえますかな。
jpnSearchText: これでお嬢様を無事に引き渡してもらえますかな。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, you got my word.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah, you got my word.
jpnChrName: ああ、約束するぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、約束するぜ。

engChrName: Now step forward niiice and slowly. Any sudden movements and I blow her brains out.
engSearchText:
Now step forward niiice and slowly. Any sudden
movements and I blow her brains out.
jpnChrName: そこからゆっくり前に進んで来い。 妙な動きを見せたらコイツを撃つ。
jpnSearchText:
そこからゆっくり前に進んで来い。
妙な動きを見せたらコイツを撃つ。

engChrName: Stop right there.
engSearchText: Stop right there.
jpnChrName: そこで止まれ。
jpnSearchText: そこで止まれ。

engChrName: Leave the case on the ground and go straight back. I'll only let her go if you do.
engSearchText:
Leave the case on the ground and go straight back.
I'll only let her go if you do.
jpnChrName: アタッシュケースを置いてまっ直ぐ引き返せ。 その後でお嬢ちゃんを開放してやる。
jpnSearchText:
アタッシュケースを置いてまっ直ぐ引き返せ。
その後でお嬢ちゃんを開放してやる。

engChrName: Got it. I hear you.
engSearchText: Got it. I hear you.
jpnChrName: ああ、了解した。
jpnSearchText: ああ、了解した。

engChrName: (Now comes the tricky part. There's no way he hands her over quietly.)
engSearchText:
(Now comes the tricky part. There's no way he hands
her over quietly.)
jpnChrName: （さて……ここから先が問題だな。   どうせヤツは素直に嬢ちゃんを引き渡さねえだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（さて……ここから先が問題だな。
どうせヤツは素直に嬢ちゃんを引き渡さねえだろう。）

engChrName: (We already agreed that Rumsfeld would go in and rescue her while I held these idiots back.)
engSearchText:
(We already agreed that Rumsfeld would go in and
rescue her while I held these idiots back.)
jpnChrName: （俺がヤツを抑えつつ執事が嬢ちゃんを救出する──   その手筈は直前で打ち合わせてあるが。）
jpnSearchText:
（俺がヤツを抑えつつ執事が嬢ちゃんを救出する──
その手筈は直前で打ち合わせてあるが。）

engChrName: (The question is what to do about the money. The safest thing would be to prioritize her safety and let the cash go.)
engSearchText:
(The question is what to do about the money.
The safest thing would be to prioritize her safety and
let the cash go.)
jpnChrName: （問題はこの身代金をどうするかだ──安全策としては   嬢ちゃんの確保を優先しつつ身代金で妥協させる策だ。）
jpnSearchText:
（問題はこの身代金をどうするかだ──安全策としては
嬢ちゃんの確保を優先しつつ身代金で妥協させる策だ。）

engChrName: (But that'd be ten million mira down the drain. Hardly chump change.)
engSearchText:
(But that'd be ten million mira down the drain.
Hardly chump change.)
jpnChrName: （この策だと１０００万ミラをみすみす   捨てちまう事になるが……）
jpnSearchText:
（この策だと１０００万ミラをみすみす
捨てちまう事になるが……）

engChrName: (On the flip side, Rumsfeld and I could trust Eddy with the case and focus on rescuing the girl. What to do...?)
engSearchText:
(On the flip side, Rumsfeld and I could trust Eddy
with the case and focus on rescuing the girl. What to
do...?)
jpnChrName: （もしくは、俺達は嬢ちゃんの確保は俺達で進めつつ   身代金は一か八かエディに任せてみるか──？）
jpnSearchText:
（もしくは、俺達は嬢ちゃんの確保は俺達で進めつつ
身代金は一か八かエディに任せてみるか──？）

engChrName: (It's settled. Forget the money. Rescuing the girl comes first!)
engSearchText:
(It's settled. Forget the money. Rescuing the girl
comes first!)
jpnChrName: （決めたぜ──   ここは身代金を諦めて確実に救出する！）
jpnSearchText:
（決めたぜ──
ここは身代金を諦めて確実に救出する！）

engChrName: All right, look. We have every intention of giving you the money, just like you asked.
engSearchText:
All right, look. We have every intention of giving you
the money, just like you asked.
jpnChrName: ほらよ──こっちはアンタらに ミラを引き渡す意思はあるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ほらよ──こっちはアンタらに
ミラを引き渡す意思はあるんだ。

engChrName: But we need to trust you'll fill your end of the bargain. What do you say you let her go forward a bit, first?
engSearchText:
But we need to trust you'll fill your end of
the bargain. What do you say you let her go forward a
bit, first?
jpnChrName: そっちも少しは嬢ちゃんを開放する 意思を見せてみたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
そっちも少しは嬢ちゃんを開放する
意思を見せてみたらどうだ？

engChrName: What did I just tell you?! You're in no position to try and boss me around. Now, are you gonna do as I say, or what?
engSearchText:
What did I just tell you?! You're in no position to try

engSearchText:
All of which is to say, thank you all for coming to
our aid.
jpnChrName: 皆様……駆け付けて頂き感謝しますぞ。
jpnSearchText: 皆様……駆け付けて頂き感謝しますぞ。

engChrName: Haha, some reinforcements! You've got chicks with you!
engSearchText:
Haha, some reinforcements! You've got chicks
with you!
jpnChrName: ハッ、増援が来たとはいえ、 女子供もいるじゃないッスか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、増援が来たとはいえ、
女子供もいるじゃないッスか。

engChrName: Yeah, we've still got the edge! Come on, Jeffrey! Let's get 'em!
engSearchText:
Yeah, we've still got the edge! Come on, Jeffrey!
Let's get 'em!
jpnChrName: ジェフリーさん、やっちまいますか！？
jpnSearchText: ジェフリーさん、やっちまいますか！？

engChrName: Damn it. No. We're pulling out.
engSearchText: Damn it. No. We're pulling out.
jpnChrName: チッ……引き上げるぞ。
jpnSearchText: チッ……引き上げるぞ。

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: えっ……？
jpnSearchText: えっ……？

engChrName: You heard me! I said we're pulling out!
engSearchText:
You heard me! I said we're
pulling out!
jpnChrName: 引き上げるつってんだろうがクソがッ！
jpnSearchText: <S6>引き上げるつってんだろうがクソがッ！

engChrName: Eek!
engSearchText: Eek!
jpnChrName: ひぃ……！
jpnSearchText: ひぃ……！

engChrName: Y-You heard him, boys! Time to scram!
engSearchText: Y-You heard him, boys! Time to scram!
jpnChrName: ず、ずらかるぞお前ら……！
jpnSearchText: ず、ずらかるぞお前ら……！

engChrName: Don't think you've won, jackass. I'll make you regret crossing us.
engSearchText:
Don't think you've won, jackass. I'll make you regret
crossing us.
jpnChrName: いいか、後で覚えてろよ。
jpnSearchText: いいか、後で覚えてろよ。

engChrName: Heh, well, that was a surprising turn of events. I half expected them to press their luck and come in swinging.
engSearchText:
Heh, well, that was a surprising turn of events. I half
expected them to press their luck and come
in swinging.
jpnChrName: へぇ……意外だったな。 てっきり勢いのままかかって来るかと思ったが。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ……意外だったな。
てっきり勢いのままかかって来るかと思ったが。

engChrName: Guess Desire's got some brains after all, especially in that fearless leader of theirs.
engSearchText:
Guess Desire's got some brains after all, especially in
that fearless leader of theirs.
jpnChrName: 《ディザイア》──特にあのリーダーは 無駄に頭が回るみてえだな。
jpnSearchText:
《ディザイア》──特にあのリーダーは
無駄に頭が回るみてえだな。

engChrName: But...that's not the important thing right now.
engSearchText: But...that's not the important thing right now.
jpnChrName: さて……
jpnSearchText: さて……

engChrName: Shit! I can't believe I actually got shot back there. Ow...
engSearchText:
Shit! I can't believe I actually got shot back there.
Ow...
jpnChrName: クッ…… まさかマジで撃たれちまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
クッ……
まさかマジで撃たれちまうとは……

engChrName: Eddy! Rumsfeld, he needs first aid right away! Can you help him?!
engSearchText:
Eddy! Rumsfeld, he needs first aid right away!
Can you help him?!
jpnChrName: エディ！　ラムズフェルド、急いで応急手当を！
jpnSearchText: エディ！　ラムズフェルド、急いで応急手当を！

engChrName: Certainly, my lady.
engSearchText: Certainly, my lady.
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: かしこまりました。

engChrName: Let me help, too!
engSearchText: Let me help, too!
jpnChrName: 私も手伝います……！
jpnSearchText: 私も手伝います……！

engChrName: Phew... Good work, everyone.
engSearchText: Phew... Good work, everyone.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……改めて、皆さんお疲れ様でした。
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……改めて、皆さんお疲れ様でした。

engChrName: We got a lot done today, between rescuing Berzelia and patching up Eddy.
engSearchText:
We got a lot done today, between rescuing Berzelia
and patching up Eddy.
jpnChrName: エディさんの応急手当も終わりましたし、 なんとかバーゼリアさんを助け出せましたね。
jpnSearchText:
エディさんの応急手当も終わりましたし、
なんとかバーゼリアさんを助け出せましたね。

engChrName: He's not completely out of the woods. I gotta hunch those goons are going to have it out for him after what he pulled.
engSearchText:
He's not completely out of the woods. I gotta hunch
those goons are going to have it out for him after
what he pulled.
jpnChrName: ああ、とはいえこのままだと 連中から逆恨みされる可能性が高い。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、とはいえこのままだと
連中から逆恨みされる可能性が高い。

engChrName: So I took the liberty of tippin' the cops off about this whole mess so they can keep 'em on their radar.
engSearchText:
So I took the liberty of tippin' the cops off about this
whole mess so they can keep 'em on their radar.
jpnChrName: っつう訳で、警察にこの一件を通報しといた訳だが……
jpnSearchText: っつう訳で、警察にこの一件を通報しといた訳だが……

engChrName: But at least you'll live to see another day thanks to our little hostage's quick thinkin', kid.
engSearchText:
But at least you'll live to see another day thanks to our
little hostage's quick thinkin', kid.
jpnChrName: 嬢ちゃんのおかげで命拾いしたみてえだな？
jpnSearchText: 嬢ちゃんのおかげで命拾いしたみてえだな？

engChrName: Eddy did nothing wrong. He was tricked by all the rest of them. How could I not help? He even managed to save the money!
engSearchText:
Eddy did nothing wrong. He was tricked by all the
rest of them. How could I not help? He even
managed to save the money!
jpnChrName: エディは皆に騙されてただけだったもの…… それに身代金も守ってくれたしね。
jpnSearchText:
エディは皆に騙されてただけだったもの……
それに身代金も守ってくれたしね。

engChrName: Thank you so much for everything, Eddy. I'm... I'm so sorry I ever doubted you. What I said was terrible.
engSearchText:
Thank you so much for everything, Eddy. I'm...
I'm so sorry I ever doubted you. What I said
was terrible.
jpnChrName: 本当にありがとう、エディ。 それと……あの時は酷い事を言ってごめんなさい。
jpnSearchText:
本当にありがとう、エディ。
それと……あの時は酷い事を言ってごめんなさい。

engChrName: No, it's okay, I totally understand. I'm the one who ought to be apologizing here.
engSearchText:
No, it's okay, I totally understand. I'm the one who
ought to be apologizing here.
jpnChrName: いや……気にしないでくれ。 オレの方が謝らなくちゃいけないんだからさ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……気にしないでくれ。
オレの方が謝らなくちゃいけないんだからさ。

engChrName: I'm...so sorry I put you through that nightmare. I can't tell you how glad I am that you're okay.
engSearchText:
I'm...so sorry I put you through that nightmare.
I can't tell you how glad I am that you're okay.
jpnChrName: 怖い目に合わせて本当に悪かった。 ……無事でよかったよ。
jpnSearchText:
怖い目に合わせて本当に悪かった。
……無事でよかったよ。

engChrName: It's nice to see the two of you make amends.
engSearchText: It's nice to see the two of you make amends.
jpnChrName: ふふ、仲直りされたようでなによりです。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、仲直りされたようでなによりです。

engChrName: We'll cover the cost of his care. It's the least we can do to repay him for what he's done.
engSearchText:
We'll cover the cost of his care. It's the least we can
do to repay him for what he's done.
jpnChrName: 彼の怪我の治療費については 我々が責任を持って負担させて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
彼の怪我の治療費については
我々が責任を持って負担させて頂きましょう。

engChrName: Looks like you can handle things from here, then.
engSearchText: Looks like you can handle things from here, then.
jpnChrName: ハッ、まあ後は父親ともどもよろしくやってくれ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、まあ後は父親ともどもよろしくやってくれ。

engChrName: Unless you need anything else, I think we're going to bounce.
engSearchText:
Unless you need anything else, I think we're going
to bounce.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、俺達はそろそろ 引き上げるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、俺達はそろそろ
引き上げるとするか。

engChrName: Mr. Arkride, everyone, thank you again for your assistance.
engSearchText:
Mr. Arkride, everyone, thank you again for
your assistance.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様、裏解決屋の皆様、 改めて誠にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様、裏解決屋の皆様、
改めて誠にありがとうございました。

engChrName: No words are enough to express my gratitude to you!
engSearchText: No words are enough to express my gratitude to you!
jpnChrName: 心より感謝申し上げますぞ……！
jpnSearchText: 心より感謝申し上げますぞ……！

engChrName: Quest A Daughter in Danger completed!
engSearchText: Quest A Daughter in Danger completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【さる令嬢の危機】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【さる令嬢の危機】を達成した！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが上がった。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: That must be the forest up ahead.
engSearchText: That must be the forest up ahead.
jpnChrName: この先は森林区画か……
jpnSearchText: この先は森林区画か……

engChrName: Better hit up Raymond before heading on in.
engSearchText: Better hit up Raymond before heading on in.
jpnChrName: 向かうなら、 レイモンドに声をかけるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
向かうなら、
レイモンドに声をかけるとするか。

engChrName: Van contacted Raymond, who proceeded to catch up to him in short order.
engSearchText:
Van contacted Raymond, who proceeded to catch up
to him in short order.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはレイモンドに連絡を入れ、 さっそく合流することに。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンはレイモンドに連絡を入れ、
さっそく合流することに。

engChrName: Before proceeding, Raymond then reached out to his sister Carol, who was too busy with work to join them.
engSearchText:
Before proceeding, Raymond then reached out to his
sister Carol, who was too busy with work to
join them.
jpnChrName: なおレイモンドが姉のキャロルに連絡を入れると やはり仕事中ではあったが──
jpnSearchText:
なおレイモンドが姉のキャロルに連絡を入れると
やはり仕事中ではあったが──

engChrName: After promising to meet up later once she could take a break, the group then ventured into the forest.
engSearchText:
After promising to meet up later once she could take
a break, the group then ventured into the forest.
jpnChrName: 区切りを付けたら必ず合流するということで、 先に記念公園の森林区画へと向かうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
区切りを付けたら必ず合流するということで、
先に記念公園の森林区画へと向かうのだった。

engChrName: Afterwards, Van and Dingo reached the memorial park.
engSearchText:
Afterwards, Van and Dingo reached the
memorial park.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは記念公園に到着し……
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、ヴァンたちは記念公園に到着し……

engChrName: Upon confirming there were no data transfer problems with the orbal network, they made their way back to Edith.
engSearchText:
Upon confirming there were no data transfer
problems with the orbal network, they made their way
back to Edith.
jpnChrName: ここでも問題なく導力ネットとの データのやりとりができることを確認すると、 そのまま首都に戻ることにした。
jpnSearchText:
ここでも問題なく導力ネットとの
データのやりとりができることを確認すると、
そのまま首都に戻ることにした。

engChrName: Van's pickup truck is parked here.
engSearchText: Van's pickup truck is parked here.
jpnChrName: ヴァンのピックアップトラックが 駐車してある。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンのピックアップトラックが
駐車してある。

engChrName: A bronze statue of Sheena Dirke gallantly stands tall.
engSearchText: A bronze statue of Sheena Dirke gallantly stands tall.
jpnChrName: シーナ・ディルクの銅像がある。
jpnSearchText: シーナ・ディルクの銅像がある。
